title: NewCryptocasinos
author: NewCryptocasinos
content: What is the best gambling token in your opinion? We want our listing to be accurate so your opinion is important. btw, we will soon come release our Christmas/Holiday casino bonus special ( early November ) it will be massive this year. so stay tuned   Thanks

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Where did you get those tokens that are currently listed in your site? I thought the Lucky Roo was the native token of Roobet at first look but it's clearly not.Most of tokens that I've seen here are quite identical in their use cases or features so the "best" ultimately depends on the issuing crypto casino.

comments.author: Hydrogen
comments.body: The main issue with tokens like brave browsers BAT is the lack of incentive to HODL long term. Most immediately dump and sell every token they have when they receive them expecting the price to diminish over the long term. Developing a viable strategy and format to encourage long term HODL with some form of burning, staking or compounding interest is what is most needed in crypto industries. I was lucky enough to gamble with bitcoin when its price was consistently appreciating. During winning weeks of gambling I would win not only through winning wagers. But also thanks to the value of bitcoin increasing which compounded my gains. That was a great experience. During some losing runs, bitcon's increase in value almost covered my losses. Fun times. I hope gambler's of the future get to experience something similar someday.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Most Gambling tokens are suited for their own casinos, I don't think there'd be much sense in finding the best one among them since they're basically a suited fit for their own casinos. Its usage as a token is basically negligible imo, they are more like a fancy system that is rather similar to the VIP system most casinos have. They're not really valuable in hodling for a long time and they basically die off after the initial hype, with only some avid gambling users of the said casino using them. Even using them as tokens to gamble doesn't really set up the economy for it properly.

comments.author: wiss19
comments.body: Quote from: Yogee on October 25, 2022, 02:42:12 PMWhere did you get those tokens that are currently listed in your site? I thought the Lucky Roo was the native token of Roobet at first look but it's clearly not.Most of tokens that I've seen here are quite identical in their use cases or features so the "best" ultimately depends on the issuing crypto casino.I think they got it from their sponsors or they are the one that search for it online. Lucky roo is clearly not from roobet because we never heard roobet announce that they will have their own token. The logo of roobet is also different from lucky roo. So far I only know one casino token on their website and that is none other than mbet token which came from moonbet casino. It was advertised here in the forum, that is why I am familiar with it and for sure many of us here do.It is hard for a new casino token to be successful if their devs won't think of unique and new ways to add on its utility because people can just go in casino tokens in which came from a trusted and more older casino.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Most of the most successful gambling tokens are already discussed here and a couple of them have even a signature campaign to distribute some of those tokens in their platform to their users.The real problem is now not which gambling token is the best but why no one of them is so successful that gets massive adoption as I think these tokens are created for a value,sure the value depends on how the casino distributing them is performing but normally their price should increase and be used even for other activities in order to be truly successful tokens.I think we already have the best cryptos which have massive adoption in the crypto casinos and specific tokens are only being used by specific users so I don't see a reason why everyone should support them,this is just my personal opinion though but I believe from what I hear from many crypto gamblers they are gambling with traditional cryptos like Bitcoin,Litecoin etc.
